recipesJson.name: Snake Oil My Way
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: Snake Oil remix - needs at least a week's steep while the coconuts and cream do things to each other

reviews.text: I have a snake oil recipe that's fantastic for regular vaping. When using the same ingredients, bumped up for sub ohm, it doesn't work well. THIS recipe works nicely, my personal taste would call for a slight bump in the flavorings. I definitely recommend people to try this one out. Good job.
This goes well with coffee. I never had the original, but I enjoyed this very much.
